0.description: Durable champions who absorb damage and protect their team
0.playstyle: Initiate fights, soak damage for the team, and provide crowd control. These champions are the backbone of team fights.

1.description: Balanced champions who excel in extended fights and duels
1.playstyle: Engage in prolonged fights, split-push effectively, and duel opponents. These champions are versatile in side lanes and team fights.

2.description: High-damage champions who excel at eliminating key targets quickly
2.playstyle: Focus on securing kills, dealing massive burst damage, and creating picks. These champions thrive on catching enemies out of position.

3.description: Champions who deal magic damage and control the battlefield
3.playstyle: Deal sustained or burst magic damage, control zones, and provide utility. These champions excel at range and area effects.

4.description: Ranged champions who scale with gold and become powerful late-game threats
4.playstyle: Focus on farming efficiently, scaling into late game, and dealing consistent physical damage. These champions need protection and time to reach their potential.

5.description: Champions who protect and empower allies through healing, shielding, and utility
5.playstyle: Provide vision, peel for carries, and enable teammates. These champions excel at keeping their team alive and creating opportunities.
